title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 207 - Voluntary Grievance Arbitration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 207 - Voluntary Grievance Arbitration

State Regulations
§ 207.1 - Policy regarding grievance arbitration
§ 207.2 - Panel of arbitrators
§ 207.3 - Agreement to arbitrate
§ 207.4 - Demand for arbitration; submission to arbitrate
§ 207.5 - Determination of jurisdiction
§ 207.6 - Arbitrability
§ 207.7 - Selection process
§ 207.8 - Notice of designation
§ 207.9 - Status of arbitrator after designation; conduct of proceedings
§ 207.10 - Stenographic record and transcript
§ 207.11 - Award upon settlement
§ 207.12 - Expedited rendition of award
§ 207.13 - Form of award and time rendered
§ 207.14 - Time extension
§ 207.15 - Expenses and fees
§ 207.16 - Filing the arbitrator's invoice
§ 207.17 - Publication of award

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 207

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, art. 14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
